entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:56 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
